message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CV, cs.RO, cs.SY

This paper proposes a reinforcement learning-based method for adjusting the parameters of a simulator to maximize the accuracy of a model trained on synthesized data. This work involves machine learning, artificial intelligence, computer vision, and robotics, which are all covered by the arXiv CS sub-categories cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CV, cs.RO, and cs.SY. Among these sub-categories, cs.LG and cs.AI are the most likely as they directly involve machine learning and reinforcement learning. cs.CV is also likely as the paper focuses on computer vision applications. cs.RO and cs.SY are less likely but still possible as the paper mentions the potential use of the proposed method in robotics applications.
